File include/ibase/libstdtime.h

Public Types

calendar_t 
    typedef struct {
         int     year;              /* 4-digit year      */
         int     mon;               /* month number 1-12 */
         int     day;               /* day of month 1-31 */
         int     hour;              /* 0-23   */
         int     min;               /* 0-59   */
         double  sec;               /* 0-61.0 */
    } calendar_t;
